question: Edit the following Pod manifest to change the image tag to '1.22-alpine' and add the annotation 'owner=study-app'.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    owner: study-app
  labels:
    app: webserver
  name: simple-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:1.22-alpine
    name: nginx-container
